data.title: Sure to Make You Nauseous
data.text: T think this is the Colonels worst. I've always liked KFC. Just not at this branch. Either the get the order wrong. After all it is brain surgery. Or its just two greasy and soggy to eat. The last time I got a bucket from there, not only was the meat falling off the bone, so was the skin with its soggy greasy crust. The coleslaw is still fine. I guess its hard to mess that up. I know place like this hire's a lot of high school kids. But still most of the time the manager is a little older.. If your going to be put in a management position, then manage. I always feel a little bit sick to my stomach the last few time's I've gotten take out. Sorry to greasy and inconsistent for me.

data.title: KFC HAS REALLY BECOME A NEIGHBORHOOD EATERY
data.text: This location is always clean and the service fast. The meals are a bargain and filling. Sometimes we eat in and sometimes get it to take home. Always good fare.

data.title: Great Place to Stay
data.text: We love Flora. She is a wonderful hostess who really aims to please. Our breakfasts were customized and she made the most delicious blueberry scones and muffins. All of the B&B perks were there, snacks, drinks and conversation. We were within walking distance of the downtown area so there was no problem with cost and availability of parking. We were provided with tickets to locale attractions. A purchase was accidentally left in the room, Flora found it and very gracious about mailing it to us. When we return to Salem, staying with Flora will be our first choice.

data.title: Fast Service without sacrificing quality of the taste of chicken.
data.text: We've stopped in here a few times for chicken. They're friendly, and fast, and yet they get the products out fast.

data.title: consistently good food
data.text: I have come here for over 40 years and have seen many of the employees who have started off as order takers and cashiers and have worked their way up to management positions.  Food is always good and is have never had any problems with anything at this placed

data.title: KFC on County St. in New Bedford, Ma
data.text: The KFC menu items are prepared correctly most of the time. I like the chicken bowls with gravy. The location of the store is congested with traffic since it is near a stop light at a busy intersection. A nice friend of mine died when hit by a car a few blocks from KFC on County St.

data.title: good service & great food
data.text: As with most if not all KFC establishments, this one is clean & easily assessable. The staff is always courteous & helpful.

data.title: Anywhere but any KFC
data.text: Ive always been disappointed with any KFC and this one is no different. Hardly any food on there chicken, most of it just fried junk. If you ask for rotisserie, it is hard a rock with less to eat on it.
